title: Sealed cell
fullText:
Cell which remains closed and does not release or take in gas or liquid when operated within the limits specified by the manufacturer. (The cells may be equipped with a safety device to prevent dangerously high internal pressure.)
[IEC 60092-507:2008, Clause 3.5.8.2]
NOTE: If sealed cells are overcharged then gassing will occur. As such, ventilation is required as for a vented cell.
